error.general: Oops! We couldn't reach our our servers. Please try again!
error.event_update: Something went wrong and we couldn't update the event. Please try again!
error.login: Your email or password is not correct. Please try again!
error.create_event: Could not create event. Please try again!
error.item_added: Could not add item. Please try again!
error.item_updated: Oops! We couldn't update the selected item. Please try again!
error.item_removed: Oops! We couldn't remove the selected item. Please try again!
error.account_updated: We couldn't update your account. Please try again!
error.profile_updated: Oops! We couldn't update your profile. Please try again!

success.login: Success! Now you are logged in.
success.item_updated: Success! We updated the selected item!
success.item_removed: Success! We removed the selected item!
success.account_updated: Your account has been updated successfully!

messages.passwordConfirmMatch: Your two passwords are not matching!
messages.minLength: The {attribute} needs to be at least {min} characters long!
messages.maxLength: This field cannot be longer than {max} characters!
messages.alphaNum: This field can only contain letters or numbers!
messages.alphaNumDiacritic: This field can only contain letters or numbers!
messages.alphaNumWhiteDiacritic: This field can only contain letters or numbers!
messages.alpha: This field can only contain letters!
messages.alphaWhite: This field can only contain letters!
messages.alphaWhiteDiacritic: This field can only contain letters!
messages.text: This field can only contain letters, numbers and punctuation marks!
messages.dateLater: The date must come later than {min}
messages.numeric: This field must contain only numbers!

search.no_results: Nothing was found with your parameters. Maybe try again with something else?

create_event.title: Create New Event
create_event.message: Please select a name for your event. You can change this later on.

dashboard.subtitle: How's your day doing so far?

info.title: Edit Event Information
info.description: Here you can edit all the basic information regarding the selected event, such as name, cover image or location. Finer details (like schedule, necessary documents) can be handled under the details menu or by {link}
info.upload_area: Drop your image here or click to upload

details.title: Specify the Details
details.description: {proverb} - says the proverb. And it's probably right, so make sure to provide as much detail about your event as possible so that on race day everyone will know their responsibilities.
details.confirm_delete_item: Are you sure you want to delete this item?
details.upload_area: Drop your document here or click to upload

competitions.title: Competitions
competitions.description: You can modify every tiny little detail of the competitions you offer for racers. Also the pricing can be modified in this page, though you can setup certain prices with a time limit.
competitions.not_found: Competition was not found. Please try selecting the event again!

account.title: Account
account.update_confirm: Are you sure you want to update your credentials? This action is irreversible and you won't be able to use the old credentials!
